original_text: Do not go out into the fields. Do not travel on the roads. Our enemies are everywhere. They have their swords ready to attack us. Danger is all around us.’ Do not go out into the fields. Do not travel on the roads. Our enemies are everywhere. They have their swords ready to attack us. Danger is all around us.’ Do not go out into the fields.
korean_text: 너희는 밭에도 나가지 말라 길로도 다니지 말라 원수의 칼이 있고 사방에 두려움이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: Do not go out into the fields
Do not travel on the roads
They have their swords ready to attack us
Do not go out into the fields
